mapper.insert: insert into merchant(merchant_id, business_place, shop_head_photo_url, publicity_picture_url, applet_code_url, patrol_code, status, industry_type, supervision_name, store_name, operator_name, operator_phone, address, address_code, credit_level, bank_type, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, supervision_id, id_card, business_card_url, pay_code_url, merchant_health_code, store_area, away_from_school, referrer, referrer_phone, wechat_company_flag, bd_id, bd, bdm, first_pay_time, is_test, is_delete) values (#{merchantId}, #{businessPlace}, #{shopHeadPhotoUrl}, #{publicityPictureUrl}, #{appletCodeUrl}, #{patrolCode}, #{status}, #{industryType}, #{supervisionName}, #{storeName}, #{operatorName}, #{operatorPhone}, #{address}, #{addressCode}, #{creditLevel}, #{bankType}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updater}, #{updateTime}, #{supervisionId}, #{idCard}, #{businessCardUrl}, #{payCodeUrl}, #{merchantHealthCode}, #{storeArea}, #{awayFromSchool}, #{referrer}, #{referrerPhone}, #{wechatCompanyFlag}, #{bdId}, #{bd}, #{bdm}, #{firstPayTime}, #{isTest}, #{isDelete})

insert into merchant(merchant_id, business_place, shop_head_photo_url, publicity_picture_url, applet_code_url, patrol_code, status, industry_type, supervision_name, store_name, operator_name, operator_phone, address, address_code, credit_level, bank_type, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, supervision_id, id_card, business_card_url, pay_code_url, merchant_health_code, store_area, away_from_school, referrer, referrer_phone, wechat_company_flag, bd_id, bd, bdm, first_pay_time, is_test, is_delete) values
(#{entity.merchantId}, #{entity.businessPlace}, #{entity.shopHeadPhotoUrl}, #{entity.publicityPictureUrl}, #{entity.appletCodeUrl}, #{entity.patrolCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.industryType}, #{entity.supervisionName}, #{entity.storeName}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.operatorPhone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.addressCode}, #{entity.creditLevel}, #{entity.bankType}, #{entity.creator}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updater}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.supervisionId}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.businessCardUrl}, #{entity.payCodeUrl}, #{entity.merchantHealthCode}, #{entity.storeArea}, #{entity.awayFromSchool}, #{entity.referrer}, #{entity.referrerPhone}, #{entity.wechatCompanyFlag}, #{entity.bdId}, #{entity.bd}, #{entity.bdm}, #{entity.firstPayTime}, #{entity.isTest}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into merchant(merchant_id, business_place, shop_head_photo_url, publicity_picture_url, applet_code_url, patrol_code, status, industry_type, supervision_name, store_name, operator_name, operator_phone, address, address_code, credit_level, bank_type, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, supervision_id, id_card, business_card_url, pay_code_url, merchant_health_code, store_area, away_from_school, referrer, referrer_phone, wechat_company_flag, bd_id, bd, bdm, first_pay_time, is_test, is_delete) values
(#{entity.merchantId}, #{entity.businessPlace}, #{entity.shopHeadPhotoUrl}, #{entity.publicityPictureUrl}, #{entity.appletCodeUrl}, #{entity.patrolCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.industryType}, #{entity.supervisionName}, #{entity.storeName}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.operatorPhone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.addressCode}, #{entity.creditLevel}, #{entity.bankType}, #{entity.creator}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updater}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.supervisionId}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.businessCardUrl}, #{entity.payCodeUrl}, #{entity.merchantHealthCode}, #{entity.storeArea}, #{entity.awayFromSchool}, #{entity.referrer}, #{entity.referrerPhone}, #{entity.wechatCompanyFlag}, #{entity.bdId}, #{entity.bd}, #{entity.bdm}, #{entity.firstPayTime}, #{entity.isTest}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update merchant_id = values(merchant_id) , business_place = values(business_place) , shop_head_photo_url = values(shop_head_photo_url) , publicity_picture_url = values(publicity_picture_url) , applet_code_url = values(applet_code_url) , patrol_code = values(patrol_code) , status = values(status) , industry_type = values(industry_type) , supervision_name = values(supervision_name) , store_name = values(store_name) , operator_name = values(operator_name) , operator_phone = values(operator_phone) , address = values(address) , address_code = values(address_code) , credit_level = values(credit_level) , bank_type = values(bank_type) , creator = values(creator) , create_time = values(create_time) , updater = values(updater) , update_time = values(update_time) , supervision_id = values(supervision_id) , id_card = values(id_card) , business_card_url = values(business_card_url) , pay_code_url = values(pay_code_url) , merchant_health_code = values(merchant_health_code) , store_area = values(store_area) , away_from_school = values(away_from_school) , referrer = values(referrer) , referrer_phone = values(referrer_phone) , wechat_company_flag = values(wechat_company_flag) , bd_id = values(bd_id) , bd = values(bd) , bdm = values(bdm) , first_pay_time = values(first_pay_time) , is_test = values(is_test) , is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update merchant
business_place = #{businessPlace},
shop_head_photo_url = #{shopHeadPhotoUrl},
publicity_picture_url = #{publicityPictureUrl},
applet_code_url = #{appletCodeUrl},
patrol_code = #{patrolCode},
status = #{status},
industry_type = #{industryType},
supervision_name = #{supervisionName},
store_name = #{storeName},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
operator_phone = #{operatorPhone},
address = #{address},
address_code = #{addressCode},
credit_level = #{creditLevel},
bank_type = #{bankType},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updater = #{updater},
update_time = #{updateTime},
supervision_id = #{supervisionId},
id_card = #{idCard},
business_card_url = #{businessCardUrl},
pay_code_url = #{payCodeUrl},
merchant_health_code = #{merchantHealthCode},
store_area = #{storeArea},
away_from_school = #{awayFromSchool},
referrer = #{referrer},
referrer_phone = #{referrerPhone},
wechat_company_flag = #{wechatCompanyFlag},
bd_id = #{bdId},
bd = #{bd},
bdm = #{bdm},
first_pay_time = #{firstPayTime},
is_test = #{isTest},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.sql: select merchant_id, business_place, shop_head_photo_url, publicity_picture_url, applet_code_url, patrol_code, status, industry_type, supervision_name, store_name, operator_name, operator_phone, address, address_code, credit_level, bank_type, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, supervision_id, id_card, business_card_url, pay_code_url, merchant_health_code, store_area, away_from_school, referrer, referrer_phone, wechat_company_flag, bd_id, bd, bdm, first_pay_time, is_test, is_delete from merchant
